LanguageData.GFL_Weapon_Radiance.label: Radiance
LanguageData.GFL_Weapon_Radiance.description: An advanced sniper rifle with integrated Hydro manipulation systems. When equipped, grants the wielder access to Intel Manipulation (single-target Hydro shot that applies debuffs) and Path of Protection (AoE Hydro blast that summons Taryz and grants powerful buffs to allies).
LanguageData.GFL_Ability_IntelManipulation.label: Intel Manipulation
LanguageData.GFL_Ability_IntelManipulation.descriptio: Launch a Hydro shot at an enemy (9 tiles). Deals 130% weapon damage and applies False Intelligence (2 turns) and Congestion (1 turn). Grants +1 Confectance Index to the user.
LanguageData.GFL_Ability_PathOfProtection.label: Path of Protection
LanguageData.GFL_Ability_PathOfProtection.description: Create an AoE Hydro explosion at target enemy (9 tiles, radius 3). Deals 80% weapon damage and applies Damp + False Intelligence. Summons Taryz to follow the target for 2 rounds (counterattacks, retargets on death). Grants all allies Deep-Rooted Bonds (2Ã— HP, heal on expire) and Overflowing Care (convert overheal to Hydro damage bonus). Heals allies and cleanses 1 negative effect.
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_FalseIntelligence.label: false intelligence
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_FalseIntelligence.description: Mind clouded by false information. +20% stagger chance, +10% Hydro damage taken. Uncleanseable.
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_Congestion.label: congestion
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_Congestion.description: Afflicted with total congestion. Cannot heal at all. Uncleanseable.
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_Damp.label: damp
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_Damp.description: Hydro energy dampens healing. -40% healing effectiveness per stack. At 2 stacks, transforms into Congestion.
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_DeepRootedBonds.label: deep-rooted bonds
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_DeepRootedBonds.description: Bound by deep protection. Max HP doubled. On expiration, fully heals the bearer. Uncleanseable.
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_OverflowingCare.label: overflowing care
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_OverflowingCare.description: Passively heals after actions. Overheal is converted to Hydro damage bonus (1.5% overheal = +1% Hydro damage, max +35%). Uncleanseable.
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_TaryzTracker.label: taryz tracking
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_TaryzTracker.description: Being tracked by Taryz. Will counterattack if this pawn attacks an ally. On death, Taryz retargets to another enemy.
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_ConfectanceIndex.label: confectance index
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_ConfectanceIndex.description: Momentum stacks gained from precision attacks. Each stack provides small combat bonuses.
LanguageData.GFL_HydroDamage.label: hydro
LanguageData.GFL_HydroDamage.deathMessage: {0} has been overwhelmed by Hydro energy.
